name: FolderSettings_Post
description: Add or edit a folder or a meter. To add a new folder use and empty ID

id.description: The ID of the folder or meter to edit. Use and empty ID to add a new folder

$ul: **AutoExportSettings**: Settings for the auto export functionality of a meter
**ExportInterval**: The export interval of the auto export
**MeterPointId**: The meter point id set by the user
**Children**: Children folder menu items (sub folder menu items)
**FolderType**: The folder type of the item
**Icon**: The path to the Icon of this folder
**Id**: The id of the folder menu item
**MeterSerialNumber**: The serial number if the folder menu item is a meter.
**UserId**: The ID of the user of this folder (only for foldertype user)
